text:
you may remember this group of Afghan
girls who came to the u.s. to compete in

a global robotics contest despite being
initially denied visas to enter the

country now we're hearing some very sad
news from back home in Afghanistan

according to the governor's office of
Herat the father of one of the girls was

killed in an Isis attack on Tuesday the
terrorists fired on a mosque during

evening prayers and two suicide bombers
blew themselves up 36 people died that
